LanguageData.AF_Hediff_AGBs41_Base.label: Sydaily Conversion
LanguageData.AF_Hediff_AGBs41_Base.description: Its body has been penetrated, and the place it touches is being replaced by the sydaily crystal at a terrifying rate. \n This process will not last long, and the transformed part will return to its original state after a period of time. \nBut after transformation, the victim's protein chains or mechanical connections will not get restored, which is a very efficient weapon to an alien race.
LanguageData.AF_Hediff_AGBs41_Base.stages.0.label: Survive
LanguageData.AF_Hediff_AGBs41_Base.stages.1.label: Adapting
LanguageData.AF_Hediff_AGBs41_Base.stages.2.label: Erupting
LanguageData.AF_Hediff_AGBs41_Base.stages.3.label: In Progress
